member.name: EXP_DARWIN_LINK
member.summary: Holds an extra data block used by . It holds the link's Windows Installer ID.

summary.para: structure stating the size and signature of the EXP_DARWIN_LINK structure. The following is the only recognized signature value.
The EXP_DARWIN_LINK structure contains a Windows Installer ID.

member.name: EXP_DARWIN_LINK.szDarwinID
member.summary: The link's ID in the form of an ANSI string.

member.name: EXP_DARWIN_LINK.szwDarwinID
member.summary: The link's ID in the form of an Unicode string.
